short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bypasses the login wall and allows you to access ВКонтакте pages without an account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
English (US) 	
Since recently, the social media website ВКонтакте prompts for a user account to simply browse through. Luckily, there is this add-on to circumvent that without clicking the little [x] every time. Enjoy more privacy while using the largest Russian social network out there!
